summary: An adaptation of Charles Perrault's famous Puss'n Boots, "The True Story of Puss'n Boots" is a story for young and old for the first time on cinema screens.
cast: Jérôme Deschamps|Yolande Moreau|Arthur Deschamps|Louise Wallon|Jean-Claude Bolle-Reddat|André Wilms|Atmen Kelif|François Toumarkine|Philippe Leygnac|Robert Horn|Pascal Ternisien|Hervé Lassïnce|Macha Makeïeff|Pascal Hérold|Myriam Hérold|Simon de Chabaneix|Thor Bishopric|Daniel Brochu|Mark Camacho|Bruce Dinsmore|Richard M Dumont|Hubert Fielden|Holly Gauthier-Frankel|Alain Goulem|Arthur Holden|Marcel Jeannin|Rick Jones|Pauline Little|Michel Perron|Terrence Scammell|William Shatner|Ariel Goldenberg|Patrice Thibaud
director: Directors: Jérôme Deschamps, Pascal Hérold | 1 more credit »
title: La verdadera historia del gato con botas
